tool_description: De Fi Crypto Exchange API finds the most efficient paths for a token swap, allowing asset exchanges at the best rates on the market.
name: De Fi Crypto Currency Exchange
title: De Fi Crypto Currency Exchange

api_list.name: tokens
api_list.description: Returns a list of tokens available for swap in the selected blockchain. All supported tokens (can also use your own).

required_parameters.name: blockchainId
required_parameters.description: The blockchain id you can choose from eth, bsc, polygon, avalanche, optimism, arbitrum, gnosis.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://de-fi-crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com/tokens/bsc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "de-fi-crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://de-fi-crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com/tokens/{blockchainid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "de-fi-crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
